summary: This is an email forwarding an official statement from the U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York regarding the death of defendant Jeffrey Epstein. It includes the statement as an attachment.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: The sender of the email forwarding the official statement on Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The deceased defendant who is the subject of the official statement.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York issues a statement on the death of defendant Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 10, 2019, forwarding an official statement on Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The statement originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
Jeffrey Epstein is referred to as the 'defendant' at the time of his death.
